column2: Alpha One to Papa Bear. Zalne is cleared of Red defenders. Over.
Papa Bear, this is Alpha Black. Boxtel has fallen. Over.
Bravo, Bravo, are you out there? Team Alpha, requesting extract. Over.
Pilot speaking. Make sure your tray table is safely stored in the upright and locked position. LZ just ahead. Bravo out.
This is Bravo. Copy you Alpha, we're coming in fast and low. Air Cav, at your service. Out.
Air Bravo here, we're on top of you, get your butts in the chopper as soon as it touches. Over.
Waa-hoo! Let's blow this popsicle stand. Air Bravo, going home. Out.
Roger that, Alpha. Objective One is complete. Papa Bear out.
Understood, Alpha One. Objective Two complete. Good work. Papa Bear out.
Papa Bear here. Welcome home, Alpha team. Mission accomplished, and then some. Out.
